title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Nevske, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny, Yampolivka, Torske, Se...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Nevske, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny, Yampolivka, Torske, Serebryanka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Petropavlivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
